short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle mute/unmute for the current tab by clicking the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Sound Manager is a Chrome extension designed to help you manage the sound of tabs in your browser quickly and easily. This extension allows you to mute or unmute tabs with a single click on the browser toolbar icon. It also supports automatic settings for muting new tabs and other user-defined preferences.
